Thank you for reading one of our stories ...

We hope you enjoyed this story places story. We would greatly appreciate your opinions on this new way of telling stories, if you have time filling out the short survey linked below will help us understand how to improve this and make new location aware story experiences. If you would like to do another of our stories please click the StoryPlaces logo in the top left corner and select another story.
